A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I want to start out by saying I’m not a die hard Star Wars fan. I don’t know the canon\, and I don’t care if they change the Star Wars universe. What I do care about is a good story. With that being said\, I won’t give away any spoilers. I’ll just say that the movie was a disappointment. I went in with no expectations\, and left with a huge “meh”. The first half of the movie felt campy\, and the second half felt rushed. I left with the distinct impression that Disney just sort of popped this one out\, without much care to it. I regret to say that this is best left to video.
